original_text: A certain Jewish man called Apollos arrived in Ephesus. He had been born in Alexandria, and he could teach people very well. He knew a lot about God's message in the Bible.
korean_text: 알렉산드리아에서 난 아볼로라 하는 유대인이 에베소에 이르니 이 사람은 언변이 좋고 성경에 능통한 자라

sentences.original_text: A certain Jewish man called Apollos
He had been born in Alexandria
he could teach people very well
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사람들을 아주 잘 가르칠 수 있었다

sentences.original_text: He knew a lot about God's message
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님의 메시지를 많이 알고 있었다
